name: Marshlight Village
description: A small village built on raised platforms over the wetlands. The residents have learned to live in harmony with the swamp, using its resources while respecting its dangers.

center.name: Stilt Houses
center.description: The village consists of houses built on stilts connected by wooden walkways. Lanterns filled with phosphorescent moss provide an eerie but practical light source.

buildings.name: The Glowing Lantern
buildings.description: A cozy inn built over the water where travelers can rest safely above the swamp.

buildings.name: Swamp Treasures
buildings.description: A shop dealing in swamp resources and protective gear.

buildings.name: Shrine of Peaceful Spirits
buildings.description: A shrine dedicated to keeping the restless spirits of the marsh at peace.

east.name: Eastern Dock
east.description: A small dock where boats can be hired for safer passage through the treacherous swamplands.

buildings.name: Marsh Boat Rental
buildings.description: Where shallow-draft boats are rented for swamp navigation.
